getOne: SELECT firstName, lastName, imageUrl FROM users WHERE id = ?
getAll: SELECT id, firstName, lastName, imageUrl FROM users

update.check: SELECT imageUrl FROM users WHERE id=?
update.update: UPDATE users SET email=?, firstName=?, lastname=?, imageUrl=? WHERE id=?

delete.check: SELECT password, imageUrl FROM users WHERE id=? && email=? LIMIT 1

delete.onlyUser: DELETE FROM users WHERE id=? && email=?
delete.userAndDatas: DELETE u, p, l, c FROM users u INNER JOIN posts p ON p.userId = u.id INNER JOIN likes l ON l.userId = u.id INNER JOIN comments c ON c.userId = u.id WHERE u.id = ? && u.email = ?
delete.images: SELECT imageUrl FROM posts WHERE userId = ?
